name: LoveR Kiss
overview: A new love deepens... The dream tag of Ichiro Sugiyama and Taro Minoboshi, who have created numerous original love simulations! A love simulation with the latest 3DCG visuals and pure love stories! Make friends with six attractive girls, and confess your feelings at the school festival two months later with a "photograph"! The teacher suddenly starts with "Lovers Days" after confessing. The story progresses in the form of recollection.
